title: I just cracked up when i saw this
body: I feel sorry for WW mains tho tbh, they get a 1 in 5 chance of getting the position they want and then a 0.9 out of 10 chance of their champ not getting banned im not a maths student but thats a pretty low chance of them playing their favourite champ...

replies.body:
An original 24% ban rate is already saying that he is either too annoying to deal with or flat out OP to begin with.

Then Riot simply broke him into a whole new level.

I personally don't feel much sorry for WW mains (the new waves starting since FF release), except prob the old old bunch who played him for years. He is an old champ who instead of falling down like most of them, aged too well with the changes. It's both a good and a bad thing to see aye.

> I feel sorry for WW mains tho tbh, they get a 1 in 5 chance of getting the position they want and then a 0.9 out of 10 chance of their champ not getting banned im not a maths student but thats a pretty low chance of them playing their favourite champ...

Why would you feel sorry for Warwick mains?

> > I feel sorry for WW mains tho tbh, they get a 1 in 5 chance of getting the position they want and then a 0.9 out of 10 chance of their champ not getting banned im not a maths student but thats a pretty low chance of them playing their favourite champ...
> 
> Why would you feel sorry for Warwick mains?

Old warwick mains.
